message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those looking for high-quality solutions. Given its exceptional features and benefits, I think it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering the unique benefits it provides, I propose a special introductory price of $200 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the product before we launch it to a wider audience. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
